scripts.dev: (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; (cd api && composer start) & (cd frontend && npm run dev))
scripts.i18n: npm run i18n:setup; for lang in de fr es it nl; do php scripts/find_translations.php > i18n/$lang.json; node scripts/translate.mjs --lang=$lang i18n/$lang.json; done; npm run i18n:setup;
scripts.i18n:setup: php scripts/find_translations.php > i18n/en.json; mv i18n/en.json frontend/i18n/
